page.title: 17Jill lives in Park Village.
page.content: I live in{Park Village.} It is very small. Only{23}people live there. There are{23}houses; some of them are empty. There are{4}children. We all come to school at Haltwhistle. On Sunday we all go to Sunday School. There are 3 teachers and 14 children because they come from farms around the village. This year we went to the Light Water Valley on the Sunday School outing. Two people have dogs and 8 people have cars. People work in Carlisle, Hexham, Haltwhistle and Spadeadam, at Gilsland. We don't have any shops, just a telephone box, post box, and a Methodist Chapel. Park Village has changed a lot since I came to live there 7 years ago. 7 people have moved and 3 people have died.
